mapper.sql: id , name, contract_no, pdf_url, member_phone, elder_id, start_time, end_time, status, sort, level_desc, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark, check_in_no, sign_date, release_submitter, release_date, release_pdf_url
mapper.select: select c.*, e.name as ename, e.id_card_no as id_card_no, r.*, s.real_name as creator from contract c left join elder e on c.elder_id = e.id left join bed bed on bed.id = e.bed_id left join room r on r.id = bed.room_id LEFT JOIN sys_user s ON c.create_by = s.id where c.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
